patthana18.19:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
patthana18.19:0.3_0: Defiled with the peacocks of committee.
patthana18.19:1.1_0: No matter how to defilement there is a cause of defilements ...
patthana18.19:2.1_0: No matter how to defilement there are no defiled ...
patthana18.19:4.1_0: Defiled by defilements, but not because of defilements,
